file_content.text: You are bold to attack, Kaliyo.
Hey, Rholl. How's the arm?
You shattered bones, but bones mend. Our wounds went deeper.
Rholl. Kaliyo said you two go back a ways.
I take it you're the pirate.
How do you break a Wookiee's arm?
You managed to hurt... that?
Leverage. Come on, look tough.
She stole from me! Tried to kill, after I treated her as my daughter!
I wanted a bigger cut, you said "no." We raided ships for a living, what did you think would happen?
I expected gratitude.
Forget that. Anyway, I've got a friend this time. Wait'll you see her work.
Forget that. Anyway, I've got a friend this time. Wait'll you see him work.
I wasn't expecting a pirate to be so sentimental.
You really cared for Kaliyo?
Oh, don't get him started.
I murder dozens each day. She was family.
Stop it, Kaliyo. We want to negotiate; make amends for what's happened.
I won't make this a fight.
Good luck with that.
You have honor. She has none.
That is why she must die. Her bones will decorate this ship!
We're not here to banter.
That's enough. [Attack]
You bleed now!
I'm sure you have quite a history together, but I'd like to get through your list of targets.
Let's hurry up and kill him.
She stole from me! Tried to kill, after I treated her as my daughter!
Don't pay attention to him. I mean--pay attention to the fight, just not what he says....
Go away!
